Name: Day of Resistance: Moment of Shattered Dreams
Title: Day of Resistance: Moment of Shattered Dreams
Desc: Victorious were we who fought to be free... Thus did the dream of eternal prosperity fall with this mighty capital...

Talent.Name: Day of Resistance: Moment of Shattered Dreams
Talent.Desc: During this Round, your targeted character takes -1 DMG. (Max 4 times)\n(Only one {SPRITE_PRESET#3007}"Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
